caption.p: Start of vegetation active period (A) from satellite observations 2001–2017, calculated as weighted average for all forest types based on their proportions in the satellite grid – days from January 1st expressed as dates; (B) as mean modeled results from JSBACH and PREBAS 1981–2010 – days from January 1st expressed as dates; and (C) mean modeled number of days difference in 2040–2070 compared to 1981–2010.
